title:
Homogeneous O-operators on BiHom-Jordan superalgebras and
  BiHom-pre-Jordan superalgebras structures
abstract:
In this paper, we recall the notion of BiHom-generalization of Jordan
superalgebras called BiHom-Jordan superalgebras in which, we investigate their
representation and associated dual representation theory. We also introduce the
notion of homogeneous O-operators of BiHom-Jordan superalgebra associated to a
given representation. Additionnaly we define the BiHom-pre-Jordan superalgebras
structures, in which we study the relationship between BiHom-pre-Jordan
superalgebras and BiHom-Jordan superalgebras via a homogeneous O-operators.
Some other related results are considered.
